title: DO-02-006: Publication of Final Rule Amending 5 C.F.R. Part 2640
summary: OGE publishes a final rule amending the regulations in 5 C.F.R. part 2640 that exempt certain financial interests as being too remote or inconsequential to affect the integrity of the services of employees, under 18 U.S.C. § 208(b)(2).
